element.name: permanent unit identifier (lower levels of description)
other title (higher levels of description)
element.element: /c/did/unittitle[@encodinganalog='ISAD 1 - 2 title']/title[@type='altra denominazione']/text()

element.name: extent and medium
element.prefix: /c/did/physdesc[@encodinganalog='ISAD 1 - 5 extent and medium of the unit of description' and @label='content']
element.element: /c/did/physdesc[@encodinganalog='ISAD 1 - 5 extent and medium of the unit of description' and @label='content']/extent/text()

element.name: physical description note (lower levels of description) | integrazione alla descrizione fisica (livelli inferiori)

element.element: /c/did/physdesc[@encodinganalog='ISAD 1 - 5 extent and medium of the unit of description' and @label='content']/physfacet[@type='note']/text()

element.name: physical location
element.element: /c/did/physloc[1]/text()
/c/did/physloc[2]/text()

root.element: /c/descgrp[@encodinganalog='ISAD 3 content and structure area']/scopecontent[@encodinganalog='ISAD 3 - 1 scope and content']/p/text()
/c/descgrp[@encodinganalog='ISAD 3 content and structure area']/arrangement[@encodinganalog='ISAD 3 - 4 system of arrangement']/p/text()

element.name: printed material

element.name: cartographic material
element.prefix: /c/descgrp[@encodinganalog='ISAD 3 content and structure area']/scopecontent[@encodinganalog='ISAD 3 - 1 scope and content']/list[child::head/text()='Materiale cartografico allegato']/item
element.element: /c/descgrp[@encodinganalog='ISAD 3 content and structure area']/scopecontent[@encodinganalog='ISAD 3 - 1 scope and content']/list[child::head/text()='Materiale cartografico allegato']/item/text()

/c/descgrp[@encodinganalog='ISAD 3 content and structure area']/scopecontent[@encodinganalog='ISAD 3 - 1 scope and content']/list[child::head/text()='Materiale cartografico allegato']/item/note/p/text()

element.name: other attachments
element.prefix: /c/descgrp[@encodinganalog='ISAD 3 content and structure area']/scopecontent[@encodinganalog='ISAD 3 - 1 scope and content']/list[child::head/text()='Altri allegati']/item

/c/descgrp[@encodinganalog='ISAD 3 content and structure area']/scopecontent[@encodinganalog='ISAD 3 - 1 scope and content']/list[child::head/text()='Altri allegati']/item/note/p/text()

element.name: corporate bodies
entities, places, and subjects - corporate body (name)

element.element: /c/controlaccess/corpname/text()

element.name: entities, places, and subjects - corporate body (type)

element.element: /c/controlaccess/corpname/@role

element.name: people
element.element: /c/controlaccess/persname/text()
/c/controlaccess/persname/@role

element.name: entities, places, and subjects - person (see also)

element.element: /c/controlaccess/persname/@altrender

element.name: places
element.element: /c/controlaccess/geogname/text()
/c/controlaccess/geogname/emph/text()

element.name: notevole
element.element: /c/controlaccess/name[@role='notevole']/text()
/c/controlaccess/name[@role='notevole']/emph/text()

element.name: physical characteristics and technical requirements - notes

element.name: other finding aids
